pullRequest.title: Try prototype MP Config 2.0 based on SmallRye
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently runs SmallRye Config 1.8.0 agains MP Config 1.4.
#build

nodes.bodyText: You were going to remove these changes
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -18,9 +18,9 @@ Bundle-Description: Microprofile Config 1.1 CDI Services
 
 Import-Package: \
         javax.enterprise.*; version="[1.1,3)", \
-        org.eclipse.microprofile.config;version="[1.0,2)", \
-        org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject;version="[1.0,2)", \
-        org.eclipse.microprofile.config.spi;version="[1.0,2)", \
+        org.eclipse.microprofile.config;version="[1.0,3)", \

nodes.bodyText: this comment isn't accurate any more

This file is probably named wrong ... should call it ConfigServerXML.nlsprops??
Same will apply to the common bundle.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@

+# Messages used by Config 1.3 Impl -  range is 0200-0299, plus 9997 for the emergency message

+
+#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# Messages used by Config 1.1 Impl -  range is 0000-0099, plus 9999 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 1.2 Impl -  range is 0100-0199, plus 9998 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 1.3 Impl -  range is 0200-0299, plus 9997 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 1.4 Impl -  range is 0300-0399, plus 9996 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 2.0 Impl -  range is 0400-0499, plus 9995 for the emergency message
+#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+# The {0} property was not found in the configuration.
+no.such.element.CWMCG0300E=CWMCG0300E: The {0} property was not found in the configuration.
+no.such.element.CWMCG0300E.explanation=The requested property did not exist in any of the configured Config Sources.
+no.such.element.CWMCG0300E.useraction=Add the property to one of the existing Config Sources, or add a Config Source that contains the property.
+
+failed.to.schedule.cache.invalidation.CWMCG0301E=CWMCG0301E: The MicroProfile Config cache invalidation cannot be scheduled. The exception is {0}
+failed.to.schedule.cache.invalidation.CWMCG0301E.explanation=Changes in MicroProfile Config may not be reflected in the application.
+failed.to.schedule.cache.invalidation.CWMCG0301E.useraction=Review the server message.log and FFDC logs to identify the problem.
+
+#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# Emergency Config 2.0 error message
+#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+# The following Config API error has occurred: {0}.
+temporary.CWMCG9996E=CWMCG9996E: The following Config API error has occurred: {0}.

+# Messages used by Config 1.2 Impl -  range is 0100-0199, plus 9998 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 1.3 Impl -  range is 0200-0299, plus 9997 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 1.4 Impl -  range is 0300-0399, plus 9996 for the emergency message
+# Messages used by Config 2.0 Impl -  range is 0400-0499, plus 9995 for the emergency message
+#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+# The {0} property was not found in the configuration.
+no.such.element.CWMCG0300E=CWMCG0300E: The {0} property was not found in the configuration.
+no.such.element.CWMCG0300E.explanation=The requested property did not exist in any of the configured Config Sources.

+temporary.CWMCG9996E.explanation=A Config API error has occurred that prevents normal operation.

Addressed GitHub comments, including:
* Updated copyright dates
* Updated RepeatConfigActions comments
* Added ID review suggestions
* Updated nlsprops file name

commit.message: Create prototype MP Config 2.0 based on SmallRye
Create config.common and config.serverxml for shared Config files
Add Config 2.0 FAT and FAT_TCK projects
Refactor Config 2.0 to new io.openliberty naming convention

beforeCommit.message: Update reference to Config from FT
